Reviews.Title: “Good location but not value for money”
Reviews.Author: Jasworldtyl
Reviews.Content: Location is good, very very near to 112 Katong mall. Staffs are friendly but not very knowledgeable in the trade. We were given a room that is still under servicing and room was veri stinks. When call the reception counter, they support to check what's going on and get back to us but we received no call. The room rate is not value for money. Its kind of steep for our room. Breakfast variety is very limited.

Reviews.Title: “Santa Grand East Coast”
Reviews.Author: fmlAdelaide
Reviews.Content: The hotel had just opened in early April so the staff were still sorting things out. A very comfortable clean hotel with a good dining room and "all you can eat" breakfast which catered for all tastes. Plenty of food which was delicious.Our room was a double which was quite small but comfortable and had a clean modern bathroom. The pool on the rooftop was clean and cool and appreciated after a hot day. We stayed for a week and found the staff particularly helpful and friendly. We were made to feel very welcome. We would stay there again without hesitation. Transport into the city was easy - bus or cab and there are plenty of good cheap eating places close by. A couple of large modern shopping centres are within easy walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, new, clean and modern”
Reviews.Author: Carolsaidias
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very nice and clean, also new and modern. The staff was very helpfull, and all the equipment are in best shape. The breakfast is not very good, but the price, in Singaporean standarts is good. The rooms are really small but it can not be apointted as a big problem. No MRT easy and close, but buses are.

Reviews.Title: “Privacy is a yes”
Reviews.Author: Zypocket
Reviews.Content: Outside the room was noisy. I cld hear them clearly as the bang the door n chat. I was taken aback by the workers doing the gardening just outside my room window. They were directly outside as my curtain was wide open. The receptionist couldv called to warn as i hv just finish bathing and in my towel. Overall there wasnt much i can say. A walking distance from the new mall.

Reviews.Title: “Well decorated, nice and quiet area, worth it”
Reviews.Author: SandyChang
Reviews.Content: I booked a twin room for four nights. It was very well decorated. my room was on the 3rd floor and the ceiling is i floor higher so it feels rather spacious. The rooms has tv, study table, fridge, safe, air con, bath tub, free net. The staffs are very helpful. Because I stayed for 3 nights and more, they offer free shuttle transfer us to airport. Its 5 min walk to 112 Katong and 20min walk to Parkway Parade and Marine Parade. All provides good quality local foods and everything else you might need. The slight disappointments are, there were no windows in my room, they built the bathroom there and completely blocked it. 2ndly the internet is not very fast. There were 2 nights that it has problem identifying. But I guess these are minor problems.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, remodeled nice nieborhood.”
Reviews.Author: ScubaSkeeter
Reviews.Content: As we approaced the area by taxi from Changi Airport, our driver commented that is is an expensive area to live (suburbs). The townhouses and condos gave way to the interesting colonial look of the pre-war city. There are dozens of restaurants and shops on the street level with living quarters above - all of the buildings appear in good condition. This hotel has small room but a good value. We paid 98usd in March for a small room but it had carpet, lcd tv, strong WiFi, firm beds and was very clean and fresh. The view to the North is a residential area, quite interesting. The staff was very efficient and friendly on check in. It is quiet, the door is wood and very heavy but we were on the 4th floor too, which helps I think. Point: A 9 sq m room, as posted elswhere here, is smaller than a prison cell. This hotel is Singapore fine, the rooms are about 22 sq m.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Small Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Adventuredino
Reviews.Content: Excellent service. I was particularly impressed and grateful for staff's (house keeper) honesty. We left our laptop and phone charger in the rooms. staff found it and returned them to us. Front desk staff were very helpful and attentive. New, neat and clean hotel. Rooms though small are well equipped. Only thing missing is the iron and ironing board which requires a deposit of SGD10. Hotel is well located and within walking distance to eateries and cafes (same street & nearby). Hotel restaurant is currently under renovation. For families, bigger family rooms are available (these rooms are bigger than the small standard rooms but are still small). I would recommend this hotel for travellers who prefer a quiter and quaint area of Singapore and don't mind small rooms. Overall, this is an excellent hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Small but very clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Linda1933141
Reviews.Content: The room is very small but it is clean and comfortable and the staff are helpful and pleasant Expensive but that is Singapore for you

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: shiggi7
Reviews.Content: My sister booked four nights here for me off the internet when I visited her in Singapore. When I arrived, the very young staff could not locate my reservation after I provided them with their confirmation message. The room they eventually gave me was tiny (9 square meters) and very expensive (280SGD). The hotel has no facilities - no restaurant, pool or health club. This hotel opened very recently and my room had numerous defects. The windows were locked shut, there was no iron or ironing board, the bedside lamp not working because it has the wrong plug for the wall socket, the bed was hard not firm and of low quality, there was no hand soap in the bathroom. Because the room was so small it went from being hot to cold very quickly. I would not recommend booking in this hotel. There are better options nearby for less money.

HotelInfo.Name: Santa Grand Hotel East Coast
HotelInfo.Address: 171 East Coast Road, Singapore 428877, Singapore
